body:
What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Player plays Tel-Jilad Exile.
2. AI plays Flametongue Kavu, that deals 4 damage to player's Tel-Jilad Exile.
3. Player regenerates Tel-Jilad Exile (does not require tapping), Tel-Jilad Exile survives but appears tapped. What is the expected output? What do you see instead? The same but Tel-Jilad Exile untapped. What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? 1.28 If you are reporting a game play bug, please attach your game.log file. If you are reporting a crash, please attach both crash.log and game.log files (both files are found in the main game folder). Please provide any additional information below.
author: [massimo....@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/106320920592650001003/)
title: Bug: Tel-Jilad Exile gets tapped after regeneration

comments.body:
"Regenerate [permanent]" means "The next time [permanent] would be destroyed this turn, instead remove all damage marked on it and tap it. If it's an attacking or blocking creature, remove it from combat." -- http://yawgatog.com/resources/magic-rules/#R6148 The tapping happens as part of the replacement effect of regenerate.

**Status:** WontFix
